tool_description: An API showing latest Indian Climate Change News
name: Indian Climate News
title: Indian Climate News

api_list.name: Indian Climate Change from specific Newspaper
api_list.description: Get the Indian Climate Change from specific newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-climate-news.p.rapidapi.com/thetimesofindia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-climate-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
